metadata.title: CVE-2021-42260 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: TinyXML through 2.6.2 has an infinite loop in TiXmlParsingData::Stamp in tinyxmlparser.cpp via the TIXML_UTF_LEAD_0 case. It can be triggered by a crafted XML message and leads to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: tinyxml package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
